trust.label: Trust

trust.text: We know the first step is often the hardest. Every patient brings their own story – and we listen before we act.
trust.point1: Over 15 years of experience in rehabilitation medicine
trust.point2: Personalized treatment plans for every patient

doctor.name: Dr. med. univ. Fadime Cenik
doctor.title: Specialist in Physical Medicine and General Rehabilitation
doctor.desc: Combining modern medical methods with personalized patient care through a holistic approach.

area1.title: Physical Medicine
area1.desc: Comprehensive diagnosis and treatment of musculoskeletal disorders. We treat the cause, not just the symptoms.

area2.title: Shockwave Therapy
area2.desc: Non-invasive treatment for chronic pain, calcifications, and tendon disorders using focused shockwaves.

area3.title: Manual Therapy
area3.desc: Professional massage and manual techniques to relieve tension, blockages, and pain.

area4.title: Rehabilitation
area4.desc: Individual rehabilitation programs after surgery, accidents, or for chronic conditions.

safety.label: Your wellbeing
safety.title: People First
safety.quote: The human being must always be at the center of all medical, economic, and professional efforts.
safety.assurance: Here, you're treated as a person, not a case. Your health and wellbeing come first.

action.title: Let's talk about you.
action.text: Schedule an appointment and let's find the best path for your health together.

q1.title: Do I need a referral?
q1.answer: No referral is needed for your first appointment. Contact us directly.

q2.title: Which insurance is accepted?
q2.answer: We operate as a private practice. You'll receive an invoice to submit to your insurance.

q3.title: How long does treatment take?
q3.answer: Initial consultation takes about 30-45 minutes. Follow-up treatments vary by therapy.

q4.title: Where is the practice located?
q4.answer: Kaiser-Ebersdorfer-Straße 328, 1110 Vienna. Accessible by bus (71B, 73A, 76B) and tram (11, 71).
